price: 14. Baaxô bagul inkih enni ittaamat waddiimaamih sangel Íe, tohuk lakal Yallih digaalák naggoowam faxa woo fidat.
arabic: وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan thumma yunjīhi
